name: PenguinHood
description:
An evil raccoon has invaded your homeland and stolen all of the food from your village! Play as Penguin Hood and sneak into his castle and steal back the food for your fellow snowy creatures. But make sure you get the right food for the right person, or you may run into trouble...

[Music and SFX sourced from freesound.com. Many thanks to:
GameAudio
Gabriel Araujo
LittleRobotSoundFactory
supervans
maxmakessounds
tyops]
